feed.subtitle: Welcome to my website! I may write about open data, programming, bioinformatics or various tech-related things.

entry.title: Welcome to my website
entry.content:
Hi, I'm Cyril and this is my website! I may write about open data, programming, bioinformatics or various tech-related things.

I made this website to share thoughts, programming tips and projects I'm working on, and things I learn along the way.

Technical notes about this website

This site is free and open source software licensed under GPL-3.0, the source code is available from GitHub. It is built with the Zola static site generator with the Abridge theme.
